Package modules.control

Class ListShowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.control.BaseController
      • modules.control.ListShowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WithAdminEnter
    public class ListShowController
extends BaseController
implements WithAdminEnter
    Represents a type of controller that is able to list out show plans for a specific movie in a specific cineplex for common user, or all valid show plans for staff

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Cineplex cineplex
      The specific cineplex that user chose before.
      private Movie movie
      The specific movie that user chose before.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Show> showList
      The whole list of all cineplexes; loaded inside enter()

      • Fields inherited from class modules.control.BaseController

        consoleUI, logMenu, logText

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ListShowController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI)
      This is for admin use.
      ListShowController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI, Movie mv, Cineplex ci)
      This is for common user use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Show> constructLogMenu​(java.util.ArrayList<Show> showList, java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
      This is to construct a logMenus containing brief information of all available shows for common user, or detailed show information of all valid shows for admin
      void enter​(java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
      This is to enter a series of actions to display all available shows for common user, or to list out all show records in details for admin to choose from

    • Field Detail

      • movie

        private Movie movie
        The specific movie that user chose before. not applicable for staff

      • cineplex

        private Cineplex cineplex
        The specific cineplex that user chose before. not applicable for staff

      • showList

        private java.util.ArrayList<Show> showList
        The whole list of all cineplexes; loaded inside enter()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListShowController

        public ListShowController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI)
        This is for admin use. No specific movie or cineplex required. To instantiate a controller specially for displaying show list
        Parameters:
        inheritedConsoleUI - the ConsoleUI instance passed down from the previous controller

      • ListShowController

        public ListShowController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI,
                          Movie mv,
                          Cineplex ci)
        This is for common user use. specific movie or cineplex required To instantiate a controller specially for displaying show list
        Parameters:
        inheritedConsoleUI - the ConsoleUI instance passed down from the previous controller
        mv - the movie chosen by the user
        ci - the cineplex chosen by the user

    • Method Detail

      • enter

        public void enter​(java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
        This is to enter a series of actions to display all available shows for common user, or to list out all show records in details for admin to choose from
        Specified by:
        enter in interface WithAdminEnter
        Parameters:
        isAdmin - true if it is for admin use

      • constructLogMenu

        private java.util.ArrayList<Show> constructLogMenu​(java.util.ArrayList<Show> showList,
                                                   java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
        This is to construct a logMenus containing brief information of all available shows for common user, or detailed show information of all valid shows for admin
        Parameters:
        showList - The whole list of all cineplexes
        isAdmin - true if it is for admin use
        Returns:
        A selected list which contains all the show entries listed on screen in sequence. Used to find the user-chosen show
